item.title: LAN Party 02/16/2024
item.description: Write me a chickpea recipe that calls upon inspiration from Salt, Fat, Acid, and Heat. When writing the recipe, include details about what certain ingredients do as well as what the functional purpose of the steps are. Recipe: Roasted Garlic and Lemon Chickpea Salad Ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz each) chickpeas, rinsed and drained 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil 6 cloves garlic, thinly sliced Zest of 1 lemon Juice of 1 lemon
